abstract: With Holden announcing they will no longer make cars in Australia after 2017 a proud history of car manufacturing will finally come to an end.
description: Since its early automotive beginnings, Holden (merging with American General Motors, to become GM-H) has offered a range of locally manufactured vehicles, either Australian or foreign designed. Imported GM vehicles have also supplemented Australian-made cars, providing Holden with a full range of models. Here we take a look at some Australian driving history via a mash-up of Film Australia Collection road safety and driving instructional films. Holden's feature predominantly, demonstrating just how popular they've been on Australian roads throughout the years.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2003024; Get Your Motor Running - Cars!; Active; 2014
